Reviews.Title: Very Good TV
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv on specs and price. Paid 175 with shipping. TV was advertised as used but in excellent condition. That was an understatement. It arrived in brand new condition. Was wrapped in protective plastic in original box. Even remote was wrapped in plastic as well as batteries. I was very impressed with performance, especially in high def. Just bought a bluray player from Amazon. Can't wait to see how pic looks in 1080P.

Reviews.Title: Surprising
Reviews.Author: Hiro53
Reviews.Content: I didnt have much expectations for this tv considering how cheap it was, but to my surprise its great quality and it made it to me without breaking. Still works months later.

Reviews.Title: nice...
Reviews.Author: frank0071
Reviews.Content: love dis tv....got so manyy cool features ..even a equalizer!!!will buyy from them again...1080p ...under 150.00...cant beat that for a 400.00 tv.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: K. Norvell
Reviews.Content: This TV is Awesome! It has everything you could want! I hooked up a Sony Blu-Ray player to this HDTV in my bedroom and the picture quality and sound are just unbelievable. This is the best quality TV for the price and it is 1080p!

Reviews.Title: RCA Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: David "obxdj"
Reviews.Content: I had 2 RCA TVs. Both less than 4 years old. Both broke within a month of each other. RCA said , sorry we don't use that manufacturer any more. RCA does not stand by their poorly made products. Bought only RCA products for years. They are not the quality brand they were in years past.AVOID ALL RCA PRODUCTS
